title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 487.5 - New york state police scientific crime detection laboratory
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 487.5 - New york state police scientific crime detection laboratory

State Regulations

The New York State Police Scientific Crime Detection

Laboratory, upon request of the investigative agency, shall be authorized to
analyze evidence and provide other support consistent with its laboratory
functions to fully investigate consumer product tampering incidents. The
procedures for such assistance shall be established by the director of the

State Police laboratories and approved by the Superintendent of State Police. Such procedures shall be provided by the Crime Analysis Unit of the Division of

State Police to appropriate agencies upon request. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
487.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
